alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:00PM EDT until August 15 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHAMPTON...SOUTHEASTERN GREENSVILLE...SOUTHERN SOUTHAMPTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL SUSSEX COUNTIES... At 400 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Newsoms to 6 miles south of Seaboard to 7 miles south of Halifax, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Boykins, Conway, and Newsoms around 405 PM EDT. Courtland around 410 PM EDT. Rich Square and Woodland around 415 PM EDT. Sedley around 420 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Adams Grove, Grizzard, Bryants Corner, Jackson, Worrell, Bryantown, Boones Crossroads, and Pleasant Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
